submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        N = len(nums)//2
        deltacount = defaultdict(int)
        maxdelta = []
        for i in range(N):
            deltacount[abs(nums[i]-nums[N*2-i-1])]+=1
            maxdelta.append(max(nums[i],k-nums[i],nums[2*N-i-1],k-nums[2*N-i-1]))
        maxdelta.sort()
        ans = N*4
        index = 0
        for x in range(k+1):
            while (index<N) and (maxdelta[index]<x):index+=1
            ans = min(ans,N-deltacount[x]+index)
        return ans
